item.description:
Hopefully we will have a nice day on Sunday and thought we could go for an easy "first" ride of the season.

No hills, a relatively short 18 miles, and no getting lost (as long as you stay on the trail).

Will try to keep a 12-15 mile pace when riding and we'll stop at a few places along the way.  18 miles is not a long distance for an experienced rider but proabaly too long for a beginner so use your judgement.  We try to stay as a group but will ask you to bike on your own or turn around if you cannot keep the 12-15 mph pace.

Things to bring:  Helmet (required), Tire Repair kit, Water

afterwords we may stop at a local pub for some food and drink

Let's meet behind the Bank of America / Not Your Average Joe's parking lot which is near the corner of Mystic Ave and Mass Ave (RT 60 & 2A)
item.how_to_find_us: Will email my phone number out to rsvp's Sun.
item.name: Minute Man Trail Bike Ride (to get back into biking!)
